content.rendered:
INDUSTRY EXPERTS IN INSPECTION,
TESTING, CERTIFICATION, LIFTING EQUIPMENT AND
TRAINING SERVICES

Click Here for a Free Quotation

Plant and Safety Services


INDUSTRY EXPERTS IN KEEPING OUR CUSTOMERS SAFE AND COMPLIANT

Plant and Safety Limited are national providers for Engineering Testing, Inspection, Certification, Lifting Equipment, and Training Services. Our objective is to keep our customers both safe and compliant with the relevant legislation and standards.

The Health and Safety at Work Act (HASAWA) 1974 is the primary legislation enforced by the Health and Safety Executive (HSE) which places requirements and general duties on employers to protect the health, safety, and employees welfare in the workplace. Breaching health and safety regulations is a criminal offence and could lead to substantial fines and/or imprisonment.

Plant and Safety Limited are experts in both keeping customer-owned equipment and people both safe and compliant within the workplace. Equipment in the workplace includes lifting accessories and equipment, plant and access equipment, industrial doors, pressure systems, and local exhaust ventilation systems. Our Electrical Testing division provides Electrical Testing, Fixed Wire Testing, and other electrical testing services. 

TESTING, INSPECTION, AND CERTIFICATION SERVICES

Under the Health and Safety at Work Act 1974, there are various regulations which require employers to ensure that equipment is safe to use, fit for purpose, and thoroughly examined by a competent body. These regulations include LOLER 1998, PUWER 1998, PSSR 2000, and COSHH 2002. Our national team of highly qualified engineers provide thorough examination and certification services on all types of equipment including: 

  • Lifting Equipment and Accessories
  • Work Equipment
  • Plant and Machinery
  • Access Equipment and MEWPS
  • Industrial Doors
  • Passenger and Goods Lifts
  • Pressure Systems
  • Local Exhaust Ventilation Systems
Click Here to learn more about this service

TRAINING SERVICES

The Health and Safety at Work Act 1974 requires all employers to provide suitable and relevant training within the work place to ensure that employees are able to work safely at all times. 

Our national training division offers a wide range range of accredited training courses covering the following categories:

  • General Health and Safety
  • Lifting Equipment and Lifting Operations
  • Working at Height
  • Forklift and Lift Trucks
  • Plant and Machinery Operations
  • Access Equipment and MEWP’s
  • NPORS Accredited Training Courses
Click Here to learn more about this service

NPORS Accredited Training Courses

Plant and Safety Limited are a Nationally recognised NPORS (National Plant Operator Registration Scheme) Accredited Training Provider, offering a wide range of NPORS Accredited and NPORS Approved Training courses, all of which can be delivered at our customer’s premises, ensuring a convenient and cost effective approach to training. 

Click Here To Find Out More About Our NPORS Accredited and Approved Training Courses


CONTACT US TO GET YOUR FREE QUOTATION

WHY CHOOSE PLANT AND SAFETY?


Industry Experts

Our team has extensive experience in providing Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services across all sectors within the UK. Our team of passionate industry experts work closely with our customers to keep their equipment and their people both safe and compliant


Quality Assurance

All of our services are backed by an extensive list of nationally recognised Accreditations and Industry Body Memberships. Our Accreditations and Memberships include ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001, NICEIC, NPORS, CHAS, Safecontractor, Safe PQQ, ROSPA, and the British Safety Council


National Provider

Plant and Safety are a national provider of Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services. Our national team of highly qualified, experienced, and competent trainers and engineers work closely with our customers to keep equipment and people both safe and compliant


Online Database

All of our Testing, Inspection, and Certification customers are automatically granted with access to our online inspection database to download examination reports for any equipment certified by Plant and Safety. Our inspection database runs on the industry leading ‘Motion Kinetic’ software

ACCREDITATIONS & MEMBERSHIPS

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Accreditation
Plant and Safety Limited British Safety Council Membership
Plant and Safety Limited ROSPA Membership
NICEIC Approved Contractor

Plant and Safety NPORS Accreditation Approved Training Provider

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Premium Plus Accreditation
Plant and Safety Safecontractor and SafePQQ Accreditation

Plant and Safety Cyber Essentials Certification
